scripts.roll: rm -rf nodejs/docs/* && rm -rf python/docs/* && node src/generator.js
scripts.build-nodejs: npm run prepare && cp -r nodejs/* . && node --max-old-space-size=4096 node_modules/@docusaurus/core/bin/docusaurus build --out-dir=build
scripts.build-python: npm run prepare && cp -r python/* . && node --max-old-space-size=4096 node_modules/@docusaurus/core/bin/docusaurus build --out-dir=build/python
scripts.build: rm -rf build && npm run build-nodejs && npm run build-python
scripts.prepare: rm -rf docs versioned_docs versioned_sidebars docusaurus.config.js versions.json sidebars.js
